item.title: The partial solar eclipse will start at 10:07GMT and will reach maximum coverage at around 11:00. Remember to not look straight at the sun as it can be dangerous, use solar glasses or a pinhole camera. #PartialSolarEclipse #SolarEclipse #Sun #Moon #Astron
item.description: The partial solar eclipse will start at 10:07GMT and will reach maximum coverage at around 11:00. Remember to not look straight at the sun as it can be dangerous, use solar glasses or a pinhole camera. #PartialSolarEclipse #SolarEclipse #Sun #Moon #Astron
